basics.name: Aaron Jenkins
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer in Test with 5 years of experience looking to leverage proven leadership, quality ssurance, and programming skills

highlights: Created applications that set up automation test framework based on API Documentation
Redefined QA processes in order to increase productivity and close gaps in test coverage
Developed new testing practices using Mock APIs and On Demand Databases
Lead team in building new tests for high priority applications that were previously untested
Organized and Taught 'Lunch & Learn' sessions for the team on Docker & AWS
Moved to new team to rewrite legacy applications in .Net Core framework to increase application stability, usability, and scale-ability
Created new Automation framework to run on .Net Core framework
Developed new application for Dev Ops team to check application health in test and production environments
Conducted interviews with potential candidates to determine technical experience
Lead team of 4 QA Engineers in Manual and Automated testing
Developed new frameworks for API, UI, and Database testing
Worked with Dev Ops team to implement new strategies to increase stability and speed of integration builds
Conducted presentations to QA department on how to implement new technology and new processes for Manual and Automated testing
Contributed to feature requirements gathering and writing to ensure ease of testing
Interpreted business requirements to write comprehensive software tests
Executed software tests to find defects and reported them to the development members and business members of Agile team
Wrote and Executed automated software tests
Lead scrum ceremonies (Stand-Up, Sprint Review, Retro)
